name: Shiatsu Kush
description: From the island of Amami Oshima comes Shiatsu Kush, a powerful hybrid strain brought from Japan by BC Bud Depot. Bred in secret for potent relief of pain, tension, and stress, Shiatsu Kush has a sterling reputation in Japanâ€™s cannabis underground. With a fusion of pine, vanilla, and cedar, Shiatsu Kush induces a heavy relaxation that calms the mind and body. Growers hoping to cultivate this award-winning hybrid should allow a 50 to 56 day flowering time.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Creative, Sleepy, Pain, Stress, Muscle Spasms, Cramps, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
